title: Earthquake Hits Coastal Town: Buildings Damaged
summary: An earthquake measuring 6.5 on the Richter scale struck a coastal town, causing significant damage to buildings.
details: The earthquake occurred early this morning, causing panic among residents. Several buildings have collapsed or suffered severe damage, and emergency services are on high alert.
author: John Smith

title: Political Turmoil: Prime Minister Resigns Amid Scandal
summary: The Prime Minister has resigned following allegations of corruption and misuse of power.
details: The resignation comes after weeks of political unrest and protests demanding accountability. The government is now in turmoil as the country braces for further developments.
author: Emily Brown
